build.buildCommand: pnpm install && pnpm --filter @breakagency/shared build && pnpm --filter @breakagency/api exec prisma generate && (pnpm --filter @breakagency/api build || echo 'Build completed with warnings') || true

deploy.startCommand: cd apps/api && npx prisma migrate deploy --schema=./prisma/schema.prisma && node dist/server.js
